related_questions.question:
4. The best arrangement of these jumbled sentences to be a good recount text is....    a. Finally I went home with my friends happily.
b.After swimming, I put on again my bathing suit and go to the bathroom to rinse my body.
c. Yesterday I went to swimming pool with my friends.
d.I brought my bag which is full of things I needed in the swimming pool.
e.I wore my clothes and put all the wet clothes into the plastic bag, so my bag would not get wet by water.
f. When we arrived there, I changed my clothes into swimsuit then I did a little warming up before I got into the pool.
A. C-d-f-e-b-a
B. a-c-b-d-f-e
C. d-c-b-f-a-e-
D. b-d-a-f-e-​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

c-d-f-b-e-a

Penjelasan: i can't find any correct answer from the option. so, i make one of mine. hope this find you helpful ^•^

related_questions.question:
3. Ms. Gina : Have you taken your lunch?
Sandy
Ms. Gina : Well, let's go find some meals.​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

3. Ms. Gina : Have you taken your lunch?

Sandy: No, I have not.

Ms. Gina : Well, let's go find some meals.​

Penjelasan:

Pertanyaan dari Ms.Gina menggunakan bentuk Present Perfect Tense karena dia bertanya apakah Sandy sudah makan atau belum. Maka jawaban sesuai dengan kalimat yang dicetak tebal, yaitu memberitahukan bahwa Sandy belum makan, karenanya, Ms.Gina mengajak Sandy untuk mencari makanan bersama.

Semoga membantu ya.

related_questions.question:
5. Invictus is a latin word means ....    a conquered
b. unconquered
c.frightened
d. soul
e. tears

6. The poem is written by...
a.Mariah Carey
b. Pete Seagar
c. William Ernest Hanley
d. Michael Jackso
e.Langston Hughes
​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

OCTOGENARIAN PROTEST  

Pensioner Maude Jennings I. celebrated her eightieth birthday outside Avonhurst Town yesterday. She was one of a large group who 2. protests against the plans for a tunnel under the River Severn. Maude's tiny cottage may 3. be demolished when new roads to the tunnel 4. are built. Maude was born in the cottage, which 5. was built in the 18th century, and the entrance of the tunnel will be built at the ends of her garden. Maude /. consulted our reporter, 'I 8. have been told by the planners, and I 9. will never leave my lovely home. I 10. have lived there for eighty years!  

Penjelasan:

Jawaban dicetak tebal dan menggunakan bentuk Simple Past Tense, Simple Present Tense, Present Perfect Tense, Simple Future Tense, Modal Verbs dan Passive Voice.

Simple Past Tense:

Nominal: (+) Subject + Tobe (was/were) + Adjective

Verbal: (+) Subject + Verb-2 + Object

Passive: (+) Subject + Tobe (was/were) + Verb-3

Simple Present Tense:

Verbal: (+) Subject + Verb-1 S/ES + Object

Passive: (+) Subject + Tobe (is/am/are) + Verb-3

Present Perfect Tense

(+) Subject + Have/Has + Verb-3

Simple Future Tense:

(+) Subject + Will + Verb-1 + Object

Modal Verbs:

Active: (+) Subject + Modal Verbs (May/Will) + Verb-1 + Object

Passive: (+) Subject + Modal Verbs (May/Will) + Be + Verb-3

Semoga membantu ya.
